title.narrative: H2O - climate smart water management for skills and youth employability

description.narrative: The purpose of the project is to replicate the H2O Maghreb project. The project was designed as a proof of concept for the provision of innovative water management skills jointly with the business sector in Morocco and implemented during 2017-2022. The purpose of the PA request is to develop four concept notes/full-fledged Project Documents for the above-mentioned countries, which have preliminarily been identified for replication based on the following criteria: i) request from a relevant government entity, ii) advancement of negotiations with the potential donors (likelihood of funding), iii) UNIDO#s ongoing portfolio in the field of skills development in the country on which to build upon. In all the selected countries, the proposed project would be part of the ongoing and/or planned Programme for Country Partnership (PCP) or Country Programme (CP).
